summary: This is an email from an FBI forensic accountant in the New York Field Office to an individual named Ted, forwarding a subpoena to UBS Bank USA dated September 25, 2019, as part of an investigation.

keyFacts: The FBI New York Field Office was actively issuing subpoenas for financial records as part of the Epstein investigation in September 2019.
A subpoena was specifically directed to UBS Bank USA on September 25, 2019.
The communication indicates coordination between an FBI forensic accountant and an individual named Ted regarding this legal process.
